title: Star P: Anata wa Motto Kagayakeru
original_name: すたぴぃ あなたはもっと輝ける
sinopse:
All these nice men of different professions! A DMM Games x RED x Kodansha media mix project!

Anzu joins Sunlight, an entertainment agency as a part-timer. There in front of her appear a host of ikemen who are an actor, voice actor, singer, comedian and a host!

(Source: The Paper Dolls Project)
